amendment.description: An amendment numbered 141 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding for the Behavioral Health Workforce and Training program by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A130) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A130) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A130) offered by Ms. Meng.
